title: Lets talk about what we miss about the old assassins that were reworked for those who played them.
body:
Lets not talk about how we got one shot by them no one misses that and it's still a thing so yeah.

I miss the laning as Talon honestly, I miss timing myself to when I go in, I miss blinking on top of them and stepping back immediately to cause my opponent to panic press their skill shot CC as well as positioning myself to block their escape because most people tend to run towards their turret to run away letting me get more autos off.

replies.body:
There was a reason to play akali instead of diana.

Literally rework is that bad.
I misss akali being a useful champ, revert her passive and give us our spellvamp back. FIX HER ULT COOLDOWN AND RANGE
